Subject: Error code
Description: Hi Support, Could you please provide information regarding the following error code? SEC_ERROR_REUSED_ISSUER_AND_SERIAL One of my users was presented with "Secure Connection Failed" and the above error code whilst opening Google.com on Firefox. Other browsers worked fine. After we removed the EPP client, he was able to access the site. Thanks Tom
Solution_Comment__c: Certificate had to be deleted from Firefox authorities tab, and then applied again.
